name: Manah Wellness
description: We are India's leading Preventive Mental Health Company, partnering with progressive organizations to foster emotionally healthy workplaces. Trusted by over 50 leading companies, we're reshaping the focus from individual mental wellbeing to collective responsibility. Engaging with 70+ companies and thousands of employees, we emphasize connectedness and stakeholder engagement for effective mental wellbeing programs. Join us in championing wellbeing to empower your organization's success.
features: Simplify mental wellbeing program launch with LEAP.
Transform EAP for employee engagement using ForeverFreeEAP.
Adopt Manah’s ACTS framework for a holistic mental wellbeing.
Headline: A step-by-step approach to Workplace Wellbeing for your people.
ShortDescription: Championing wellbeing for those in the world's toughest roles

Highlights.name: Prevention Focused
Highlights.description: We believe in proactively engaging employees rather than reactive.

Highlights.name: Led by Experts
Highlights.description: Our team is led by highly qualified mental health professionals.

Highlights.name: Holistic Approach
Highlights.description: We build a custom program tailored to the needs of your employees.

enhanced_description: Manah Wellness is India's leading Preventive Mental Health Company, dedicated to fostering emotionally healthy workplaces through a step-by-step approach to wellbeing for organizational people. Trusted by over 50 leading companies and engaging with 70+ companies and thousands of employees, Manah Wellness champions collective responsibility and emphasizes connectedness and stakeholder engagement for effective mental wellbeing programs. The company focuses on proactively engaging employees rather than reactively, with programs led by highly qualified mental health professionals. Their holistic approach involves building custom programs tailored to employee needs, utilizing frameworks like LEAP for simplified program launch, ForeverFreeEAP for enhanced employee assistance programs focused on engagement, and the ACTS framework for comprehensive mental wellbeing.
key_use_cases: Enhancing employee engagement through mental wellbeing initiatives
Transforming Employee Assistance Programs (EAP) for better engagement
Promoting collective responsibility for mental health within an organization
competitive_advantages: Leadership by qualified mental health professionals
Emphasis on collective responsibility for mental wellbeing
Proven track record with over 50 leading companies in India
Proprietary frameworks (LEAP, ForeverFreeEAP, ACTS) for program implementation and engagement
implementation_scenarios: Customized program implementation based on organizational needs
Structured launch of mental wellbeing programs using the LEAP framework
roi_benefits: Empowering organizational success through wellbeing initiatives
scalability_features: Designed for a wide range of company sizes (Small, Large, Global Enterprise)
Capable of engaging thousands of employees across multiple organizations
